message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a premium item. I'm willing to provide a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the product. What do you say?
I'm not buying it. I'll wait and see what the next product is.

I'm not buying it. I'm not convinced that this one is any better than the last one, and I don't want to pay full price.
